title: Fragment of a dedication to Augustus
support: No details of the fragment are preserved.

handNote.lettering: Gualtherus comments that the text is in 'literis palmaribus', i.e. c.25 cm high.

provenanceFound._: Recorded by Gualtherus as 'in aede Matthaei Bertholi, medici', but not seen since.
